subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dillon Gee gave up three runs in seven innings, but it was nothing like the pitching in the Mets’ three previous games, when the Cardinals scored one run total and were no-hit.
snippet: Dillon Gee gave up three runs in seven innings, but it was nothing like the pitching in the Mets’ three previous games, when the Cardinals scored one run total and were no-hit.
